head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GOULD, JOSEPHINE M. (BRODIE)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GOULD, JOSEPHINE M. (BRODIE)

block.p: GOULD-Josephine M. (Brodie), 83, of Monroe Township, NJ and Lake Worth, FL, on March 29, 2003. Beloved wife of Nathan H. Devoted mother of Alyson Lee Gould and special friend, Susan Byrd, of Wilmington, NC; Dr. Thomas Steven Gould and wife, Constance Soss Gould, of Longmeadow, MA., and Scott Jay Gould and Michael Castro of Manhattan. Adoring grandmother of Rachel Lauren and Sarah Catherine. Cherished by many cousins, nieces, nephews and friends. Service 10:45 AM, Thursday, Mount Sinai Memorial Chapels, Cranbury Road at Evergreen Blvd., East Brunswick, NJ. In lieu of flowers, memorial contributions to Clearbrook Chapter of ORT, Monroe Township, New Jersey.
